title: Chapter 2484 - Chapter 2484: Chapter 2484-Killing Non-Human Beings
body:
Chapter 2484 - Chapter 2484: Chapter 2484-Killing Non-Human Beings

Chapter 2484: Chapter 2484-killing non-human beings

Translator: 549690339 |

Lu Ming swaggered over. The dragonians did not pay much attention to him after they saw him.

Lu Ming wandered around for a while and suddenly rushed toward the cursed

land.

“What are you doing?”

“You’re looking for death!”

On the side, the dragonians roared.

The people of the yellow Springs world had been cursed for generations. They could not enter the cursed Lands. Once they entered, they would die.

In their opinion, Lu Ming was courting death!

However, Lu Ming’s speed did not slow down at all. He ran wildly and approached the castle in the blink of an eye.

“He’s fine, he’s fine!”

The dragonmen looked at each other.

According to their experience, as long as they were within a certain range of the cursed land, they would be cursed and die on the spot. However, Lu Ming had already run to the castle and he was fine.

it’s fake. Damn it. He must be fake. He’s pretending to be a Dragonman!

“Detestable!”

On second thought, the dragonians knew that Lu Ming was an imposter. Only outsiders could enter the cursed land.

However, they could only watch helplessly and did not dare to pursue.

The castle was huge, and the gate was open.

Lu Ming rushed in directly.

Behind the door was a dark passage.

Lu Ming reduced his speed and advanced carefully. This cursed land was

dangerous.

However, there was no danger in this passage. When Lu Ming was about to reach the end, nothing happened.

However, at the exit of the passage, there were two foreign races guarding it.

“You are…”

They were stunned when they saw Lu Ming.

That was because Lu Ming was still in his Dragonman form. Could a Dragonman enter this place? That was why they didn’t know how to react.

Buzzzzzz!

Lu Ming took the opportunity to charge forward. His palm was like a knife, cutting horizontally.

Bang! Bang!

With two loud bangs, the two alien races were killed by Lu Ming. He charged

past them.

Behind the passage was a huge platform, and In front of the platform were two

wide roads.

The two paths led in different directions.

The road on the right was pitch-black and covered in a bloody mist. It was a terrifying sight.

As for the road on the left, it was also covered in white fog, blocking one’s vision and making it impossible for one to see what was ahead.

On the platform, there were more than a dozen foreign kinds either standing or sitting. On the road to the left, there were also a few foreign kinds standing there.

Only the right path didn’t have any foreign races.

As soon as Lu Ming entered, more than ten alien races looked at him in unison.

“Dragonman?”

no, it’s definitely not a Dragonman. Someone is pretending!

“Who cares who he is? He doesn’t have the aura of my race, so he must be from the heaven realm. Kill him!”

A cold aura bloomed as a cold voice sounded.

Buzzzzzz!

One of the four-armed alien was the first to charge at Lu Ming at an extremely

fast speed.

This alien had the cultivation base of a three-star heavenly Emperor, which was very powerful.

However, his opponent was Lu Ming. A purple-gold light emanated from Lu Ming’s body. His power of domination condensed into a long spear and he thrust it forward.

It looked like Lu Ming was stabbing at the void, but as he did so, a scream was heard. The four-armed alien appeared out of thin air, his head pierced by Lu

Ming.

A three-star heavenly Emperor was killed instantly.

“Not good, this person is very strong. Let’s attack together!”

“Kill!”

Other than a few who were not even heavenly emperors, the rest of the alien races were all heavenly emperors.

A few of them were extremely terrifying.

Two four star heavenly emperors and one five star heavenly Emperor.

Lu Ming no longer hid his abilities and attacked with all his might.

The great desolation spear appeared in his hands. Lu Ming was bathed in the purple-gold light. The long spear vibrated and he stabbed a few times in succession.

The two four-star heavenly emperors were sent flying by Lu Ming and they

spat out mouthfuls of blood.

The five-star heavenly Emperor’s body trembled violently and he retreated.

Lu Ming was unleashing his full power now. He was so powerful that even a five-star heavenly Emperor was not his match.

“Not good, this person is difficult to deal with, quickly call him Sir!

The five-star heavenly Emperor roared.

“Call me Lord!”

A few of the demonic humans, who were guarding the intersection on the left, rushed into the road.

“Kill!”

Lu Ming wielded his long spear, his killing intent as sharp as a knife, and charged towards the foreign kinds.

With a sweep of the long spear, a few of the foreign races were sent flying with broken bones and tendons, dying on the spot.

“Damnit!”

The five-star heavenly Emperor roared angrily. A yellow stone flew out of his third eye. It exuded a powerful aura and was thrown at Lu Ming.

“This is… Heaven Dao soldiers? No, there’s no aura of the heavenly Dao. It’s a weapon of this world!”

Lu Ming’s heart stirred.

The misty yellow stone that the other party had taken out was a weapon equivalent to a heavenly Dao soldier. It was a weapon from netherworld mountain, and there were many wondrous formations engraved on it. As long as one injected energy into it, it would be activated.

BOOM!

Lu Ming shook his long spear and swept it out, colliding with the stone.

The rock was sent flying. The non-human five-star heavenly Emperor was also forced to retreat by Lu Ming’s powerful energy.

Lu Ming strode forward, his long spear stabbing out continuously.

Pfft! Pfft!

One by one, the alien races died under Lu Ming’s spear.

With Lu Ming’s current combat strength, anyone below the level of a four-star heavenly Emperor would not be able to withstand a single blow from him.

In the blink of an eye, there were only five or six of the foreign kinds left.

The rest of the non-humans were terrified. They didn’t dare to continue fighting and turned to run.

“You’re looking for death!”

At this moment, an angry roar camefromthe left road.Aburly figure rushed out from the road, stirring up white mist like a hurricane.

He had yet to come out but his violent aura was already pressing toward Lu Ming.

“Six-star heavenly Emperor?”

Lu Ming muttered fearlessly. He strode forward and the terrifying purple-gold Spear’s gleam charged towards a four-star celestial Thearch of the foreign tribe.

The foreign being tried his best to block the attack, but he spat out a mouthful of blood. One of his arms exploded, and he was severely injured.

“My Lord, save me!”

The alien shouted.

“You dare?”

The voice roared in the road.

“Kill!”

Lu Ming was very decisive. He attacked again. The Spear’s gleam pierced through the air and directly pierced through the injured four-star heavenly Emperor, killing him in the air.

Buzzzzzz!

At this moment, a pale-white Saber Light slashed out from the intersection. It was shockingly powerful and the terrifying force was headed straight for Lu

Ming’s face.

Lu Ming’s arm shook and the great desolation spear changed its direction rapidly, blocking in front of him.

Clang!

There was a violent tremor and Lu Ming felt a violent force charging at him. He could not help but retreat.

Then, a burly alien with a saber in his hand walked out of the intersection.

This foreign being’s three eyes glowed with a cold light, and his body exuded a powerful aura.

A six-star heavenly Emperor!

Then, with a flash, five or six figures rushed out from the road on the left, each of them an expert.

“Four five star heavenly emperors!”

Lu Ming could tell the other party’s cultivation level.

One six star heavenly Emperor and four five star heavenly emperors.
